Hello John,

I created a imho really nice module, which greatly simplifies the process of dealing with forms, while giving the programmer the maximum amount of flexibility. The proud father I am, I want as many people as possible being aware of this option, so I was wondering if you might consider to do a little feature about it?

Here comes the repository link: https://github.com/johannesjo/ng-fab-form

I totally understand if you don’t want to, but I thought it might be interesting.

Best Regards,
